The Warrior.name: The Warrior
The Warrior.description: You enjoy powerful and intense tracks that motivate you.

Live Enthusiast.name: Live Enthusiast
Live Enthusiast.description: You thrive on the energy of live performances.

The Thinker.name: The Thinker
The Thinker.description: Your taste leans towards music that stimulates thought.

Party Man.name: Party Man
Party Man.description: The life of the party! You love upbeat and danceable tunes.

Extrovert.name: Extrovert
Extrovert.description: The life of the party! You love upbeat and danceable tunes.

Introvert.name: Introvert
Introvert.description: You appreciate more laid-back and introspective tracks.

The Shredhead.name: The Shredhead
The Shredhead.description: You love music with intense guitar shredding and powerful riffs.

Emotional.name: Emotional
Emotional.description: Music is a powerful emotional experience for you.

The Heartbroken.name: The Heartbroken
The Heartbroken.description: Music is your emotional outlet, especially during tough times.

Instrumentalist.name: Instrumentalist
Instrumentalist.description: You appreciate the intricacies of instrumental music.
